com.revolsys.collection

Interface ResultPager<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object to page.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcQueryResultPager, ListResultPager

    public interface ResultPager<T>
extends AutoCloseable

    The ResultPager defines an interface for paging through the results of a query. Methods are provided to set the number of objects to display per page and the current page number. When these values change the implementation will update the information about the number of pages and if the current page is the first/last page or has previous/next pages that allow user interfaces to display the appropriate navigation controls. The getList() method is used to return the List of objects in the current page.

    Author:
    Paul Austin
